Name: Community Garden
About the game: Community Garden exists as a place for the VR community to escape from reality. Explore the city, plant a garden or throw some rocks in a pond or shoot some hoops. Do all this with other VR players from around the world. Get lost in a VR city that focuses on realism and immersion. Join the Community Garden today! Powered by Improbable's SpatialOS
